description: Episode of Series "Lonely planet: the experience". Experience Northern India with another 'Lonely Planet' travelling video. Climb an elephant's trunk, learn yoga at an ashram, float along the sacred River Ganges, take a rickshaw to the Taj Mahal and spin prayer wheels in a Buddhist gompa.
